Name: Whiskered Away
About the game: Whiskered Away is an asymmetrical 2D party game where three players play as cats and compete to collect 'shinies'. Meanwhile another player as Poseidon attempts to stop the cats from stealing his treasure through godly means. The cats must avoid Poseidon's powers and survive until the time runs out. **GAME IS ONLY 4 PLAYERS.**
